channel.title: Abouts on Thilak Mahendran
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Thilak Mahendran

item.title: Work
item.description: Federal Office of Administration, Germany 2020 - Today Head of Center of Comptency for Open Data IBM 2016 - 2020 Senior Application Consultant for AI 2019 - 2020 Global Alliances Leader for IBM Watson IoT Center 2015 - 2018 Youth Ambassador for IBM Watson IoT Center 2014 - 2016 Technical Sales for IBM Collaboration Solutions

item.title: Education
item.description: Personal details DOB 1989 GEO Based in Cologne, Germany. Education MASTER of Science, FOM University , Germany BACHELOR of Arts (Hons.), University of Warwick , UK

item.title: Training & Development
item.description: IBM Badges 2017-2020 Enterprise Design Thinking Co-Creator; Enterprise Design Thinking Practitioner; IBM Blockchain Essentials; Watson and Cloud Foundations; Data Science for Business; Data Science; Cognitive Practitioner see all

item.title: Interests
item.description: Interests DIGITAL Ethics in AI, eGovernment, Open Data, Open Source MEMBERSHIPS BÜNDNIS 90/DIE GRÜNEN , Amadeu Antonio Foundation , ver.di MUSIC Check out my curated Spotify playlist . It’s mostly rap.
